title: Finding $$r$$
text: For a complex number $$z$$ $$=$$ $$a+bi$$, $$r$$ $$=$$ sqrt(a**2 + b**2)

title: Calculating $$r$$
text: The number $$z$$ $$=$$ 3i is the same as $$z$$ $$=$$ $$0$$ + 3i. Writing it in polar form, we can plug in a $$=$$ $$0$$ and $$b$$ $$=$$ $$3$$. What is $$r$$?

title: Finding the angle
text: $$z$$ $$=$$ 3i has a real component of $$0$$ and positive imaginary component, meaning its polar angle is pi/2!
